title: EFF Statement on Nevada's Attack on End-to-End Encryption
description: EFF learned last week that the state of Nevada is seeking an emergency order prohibiting Meta from rolling out end-to-end encryption in Facebook Messenger for all users in the state under the age of 18. The motion for a temporary restraining order is part of a lawsuit by the state Attorney General alleging that Meta‚Äôs products are deceptively designed to keep users addicted to the platform.
